description: Alterations to the existing basement rear extension including alterations to its windows and installation of stair to the roof and creation of roof terrace, erection of single storey extension to ground floor,  reinstatement of a historic stair between basement and ground floor, internal changes to the basement layout,  with conversion of existing two units to a single dwellinghouse.
decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 18(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended.

<p><span style="font-size:11pt">All new works, and works of making good to the retained fabric, whether internal or external, shall be<br>finished to match the original work with regard to the methods used and to material, colour, texture and<br>profile, and in the case of brickwork, facebond and pointing.</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt"><br>REASON: To ensure that the special architectural and historic interest of this building is safeguarded and<br>that the proposal does not detract from the character and appearance of the Conservation Area.</span><br></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt">Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must<br>be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before any work is commenced. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved<br>A. Internal doors, architrave and profiles to include 1:10 elevations and cross section and 1:5 panelling<br>B. External doors<br>C. Stairs including risers and treads<br>D. Balustrade<br>E. Windows<br>F. Render mix<br>G. Method statement proposed render removal</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt"><br>REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</span><br></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt">No soil stacks, soil vent pipes, flues, ductwork or any other pipework shall be fixed to the (street) elevations of the building other than as shown on the drawings hereby approved.</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt"><br>REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not&nbsp;detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</span><br></p>
